original_text: You will say to me then, “Why does he still find fault? For who can resist his will?”
korean_text: 혹 네가 내게 말하기를 그러면 하나님이 어찌하여 허물하시느냐 누가 그 뜻을 대적하느냐 하리니

sentences.original_text: You will say to me then,
Why does he still find fault?
For who can resist his will?”
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그의 뜻을 누가 능히 막을 수 있겠는가?
